alert.note: Alert for Extreme Western Allegany (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 10 at 3:30AM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...SLICK SPOTS POSSIBLE THIS MORNING... Temperatures have fallen below freezing as the cold front has moved east of the area. This coupled with snow showers expected to bring a coating to 2" through daybreak will result in slippery conditions which may impact the morning commute. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Slow down and use caution while traveling. When venturing outside, watch your first few steps taken on steps, sidewalks, and driveways, which could be icy and slippery, increasing your risk of a fall and injury.
